Class ShowBoundary

java.lang.Object
Boundary
ShowBoundary
All Implemented Interfaces:
Base, BaseBoundary
public class ShowBoundary extends Boundary implements BaseBoundary
A Show boundary object

A ShowBoundary object used to process all Show input and output
